title: whats the point in kayle's later levels
body: if level 6 grants range level 11 grants shockwaves does that mean level 16 is useless? its only a puny 75 attack range. did they keep permanent exalted?

replies.body: If I recall they kept permanently exalted
Oh cool at least I can still hover towards a 1v5 to get a pentakill.
ill still play kayle but her leveling systems begs the question.
